thread.title: Super Bowl in Houston for Brady and Lady Gaga
thread.title_full: Super Bowl in Houston for Brady and Lady Gaga

title: Super Bowl in Houston for Brady and Lady Gaga
text: show ad Smiling ex-President George Bush gets Super Bowl underway with coin toss as Tom Brady and the Patriots bid for history against Falcons... but will Lady Gaga steal the show? Former president George H.W. Bush and his wife Barbara were the guests of honor at the coin toss on Sunday Highly charged atmosphere before the Super Bowl in Houston as the New England Patriots and Atlanta Falcons prepared to face off at the NRG Stadium Quarterback Brady is going after a record fifth crown among quarterbacks and coach Bill Belichick is going for a record fifth title as a coach 'We're ready to go,' declared Patriots coach Bill Belichick, according to the pool report. 'We've covered everything. We'll finish off our meetings and stuff, but we're done on the field.'
